original_text: Pharaoh was angry with his two officers, both the cupbearer and the baker.
korean_text: 바로가 그 두 관원장 곧 술 맡은 관원장과 떡 굽는 관원장에게 노하여

sentences.original_text: Pharaoh was angry with his two officers
sentences.korean_translation: 바로는 그의 두 관리에게 화가 났다

sentences.original_text: both the cupbearer and the baker
sentences.korean_translation: 즉, 술 맡은 관원과 떡 만드는 관원 둘 다에게
